rdf:Description.dc:title: A comparison of Alberta's environmental standards to those of other North American jurisdictions 1999

Alberta Government Library*"Surface water quality guidelines for use in Alberta" replaces Section 3 [Section C] of the "A comparison of Alberta's environmental standards to those of other North American jurisdictions."
